name: News Element Elementor Blog Magazine
author: Ashraf

sections.description:
News Element is the #1 Elementor addon for creating fully customized News, Magazines, Review Websites, Personal Blogs, Travel Blogs, Fashion Blogs, Viral News, Food Reviews, Recipes Blogs, etc.

Useful Links

Homepage
Buy Pro

Starter Sites

News Element comes with built in ready starter sites. You can import full site without any issue.

ğŸ”¥ Best News, Magazine & Blog Building Tool

News Element is mostly used for creating News Magazine sites. So, It is also well known as News Plugin. However, it is a multi-functional plugin that fulfills all required features for creating blogs along with news and magazine sites.

Pro features of News Element are Archive Builder,Related Posts, Ajax Filter and Pagination, Post Carousel, etc.

Key Features of News Element

These Widgets come with a lot of key features.

  • Ajax Category Filter
  • Header footer builder
  • Archive page builder
  • Single post builder

sections.installation:
1. Upload “News element” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “News Element” menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How can I contact/report issue?

Just drop a message, here

Elementor editor fails to load or not working?

It’s due to your server PHP settings. Increase your server PHP memory limit from the wp-config.php file or php.ini file. If you don’t have an idea about it. Please contact your hosting provider and ask to increase
* PHP memory_limit = 512M
* max_execution_time = 300
